text: avarukku piṉ, ava(rava)r camūkattiṉarukkut tūtuvarkaḷai aṉuppivaittōm; avarkaḷum teḷivāṉa attāṭcikaḷai a(ccamūkatta)varkaḷiṭam koṇṭu vantārkaḷ; eṉiṉum, muṉṉar iruntavarkaḷ enta (uṇmaiyaip) poyyeṉak kūṟik koṇṭiruntārkaḷō, (anta uṇmaiyai) ivarkaḷum nampavillai - varampu mīṟum ittakaiyavarkaḷiṉ neñcaṅkaḷ mītu ivhvaṟē nām muttiraiyiṭukiṟōm
